install.description: This module shows an IFrame window to specified location

param.name: url
param.label: Url
param.description: URL TO SITE/FILE YOU WISH TO DISPLAY WITHIN THE IFRAME

param.name: scrolling
param.label: Scroll Bars
param.description: SHOW/HIDE HORIZONTAL AND VERTICAL SCROLL BARS.

param.name: target
param.label: Target Name
param.description: Name of the IFrame when used as Target

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
